content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a stone_hoe I need two sticks. To craft a stick I need bamboo, which I have at slot 10. I will move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 3, "index": 10}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: I need another stick to craft the stone_hoe, so I will move another bamboo to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 10}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: The first stick has been crafted. I will move it to an empty inventory slot (12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 10}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: I need to craft a stick, which requires 2 bamboo. I have 2 bamboo in slot 10, so I will move one to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: I need to craft a stick, which requires 2 bamboo. I already moved one to slot 1, so I will move another to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: I can now craft the stick by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 14).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a stone hoe, I need to place cobblestone in the top left corner of the crafting table. Therefore I will move the cobblestone from slot 33 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: The second cobblestone needs to go to the right of the first one, so I will move the blackstone from slot 20 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: Next I need to place a stick underneath the two cobblestones, so I will move the stick from slot 12 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: Finally, I need to place another stick underneath the first one, so I will move the stick from slot 14 to slot 8.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 8 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the stone hoe, I need to move it to an empty inventory slot. I will move it from slot 0 to slot 12.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
